About the Game



‚ñ† Story


Estella, a cat-eared girl, teleported into a mysterious dimension after activating a magic crystal.
She must use the power given to her by„ÄåSuccubus„Äçto try to find her way home.
Would she return home safely?



Or would she be captured by monsters and raped until she broke?
Or would she ‚ñÆ‚ñÆ‚ñÆ‚ñÆ‚ñÆ by gathering too much„ÄåSex Power„Äç?
Estella's fate is up to you.

‚ñ† Gameplay


This is an action game that contains a special turn-based system.
Bandits, animals, monsters‚Ä¶ Find a way home in this dangerous, cursed dimension.
If lost in battle, Estella can level up using the„ÄåSex Power„Äçgained during sex.

‚ñ† Game Features


‚óáSex scenes unlocked during combat and smooth„ÄåDefeat videos„Äçmade in Live2D are about 20 minutes in total.
‚óáPlenty of types of enemies, with each Boss having their exclusive sex scenes.
‚óáThis is an easy game that even players who are not good at combat games can enjoy.
‚óáUnlock all CGs in Recall after playthrough.
‚óá3 types of ending, including a virgin ending.

data.short_description: In search of a cure for her father's illness, Estella, a cat-eared girl, entered the Cursed Forest by herself. When she accidentally activated a mysterious crystal, she was drawn into an alien dimension sealed by a magical anomaly. She then met a woman who called herself„ÄåSuccubus„Äçand gained mysterious powers from her...
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Turkish, Japanese*, Thai, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, French, Vietnamese, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN8/WIN10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN8/WIN10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, sexual acts,  extreme violence, beastiality, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
